Title: Bulgargaz awards June LNG cargo to RWE
Description: Bulgarian public gas supplier Bulgargaz has selected Germany’s RWE Supply & Trading as its LNG supplier in June 2025.
Author: JS

Title: Tepco begins fuel loading at Unit 6 of Kashiwazaki-Kariwa nuclear power plant
Description: Tokyo Electric Power Co. has begun loading fuel at Unit 6 of the Kashiwazaki-Kariwa Nuclear Power Station in Japan’s Niigata Prefecture, marking a step toward restarting the 8.2 GW nuclear complex—but one that is unlikely to affect Japan’s near-term LNG demand.
Author: CK

Title: Greater Tortue Ahmeyim FLNG ships its third LNG cargo, initiates commercial deliveries
Description: The BP-led 2.5 mypa Greater Tortue Ahmeyim floating LNG project offshore Mauritania and Senegal has completed loading its third LNG cargo onto the British Contributor LNG tanker, marking the first commercial shipment from the facility following earlier commissioning exports.
Author: CK

Title: CLPe, CNOOC complete Hong Kong’s first LNG bunkering with simultaneous cargo handling
Description: Industrial energy solutions provider CLPe and CNOOC Guangdong Water Transport Clean Energy Co. have completed Hong Kong’s first ship-to-ship LNG bunkering conducted concurrently with cargo handling, supplying around 10,000 m3 of LNG to Hapag-Lloyd’s Hanoi Express during cargo handling at Kwai Tsing Container Terminals on June 5.
Author: CK
